atschool1.description:
Milo is making friends at school. This is Leo, who is 2½.

When Lucie drops the boys off in the morning, Milo still makes a fuss about wanting to stay with Felix, but with less conviction than before.
atschool1.title: Atschool 1

atschool2.description:
Milo gives Julian and Phineas a ride on the wagon.

Julian's dad is French. Julian doesn't talk much yet but Lucie's glad to have another kid to speak French to.
atschool2.title: Atschool 2

experiments1.description: Nana sent Felix a very neat science book. We've done several of the experiments already. This one involves lowering a small jar of hot water, tinted red, into a big jar of cold water.
experiments1.title: Experiments 1

experiments2.description: The hot water, being lighter, rises to the top.
experiments2.title: Experiments 2

experiments3.description: To Milo, "science experiment" means something is about to go boom. He insisted on viewing the proceedings from inside. Blame Diet Coke and Mentos.
experiments3.title: Experiments 3

experiments4.description:
This next experiment demonstrated that some liquids and objects are lighter than others. Felix was fascinated.

A few days later, Felix told us: "So... Earth is the heaviest, then water, then air, and then space is the lightest. But what is lighter than space?"
experiments4.title: Experiments 4

experiments5.description: Felix's greatest discovery:  Karo cane syrup is not only very heavy but also mighty tasty.
experiments5.title: Experiments 5

rv_1.description: That's our RV! Felix was positively vibrating when he first stepped inside it.
rv_1.title: Rv 1

rv_1st_stop.description: We embraced the RV lifestyle. Our first stop was at McDonald's for happy meals.
rv_1st_stop.title: Rv 1st Stop

rv_campground1.description: Our RV park came complete with a playground, a swimming pool and hot tub, miniature golf, and pizza delivery to our campsite.
rv_campground1.title: Rv Campground 1

rv_campground2.description: The closest we came to wildlife was watching the kids bounce on the giant jumping pillow.
rv_campground2.title: Rv Campground 2

rv_campground3.description:
The highlight of any camping trip is roasting marshmallows.

Felix takes the opportunity for scientific musing: "Look, the paper shrinks when I put it in the fire; but the marshmallow gets bigger!"
rv_campground3.title: Rv Campground 3

rv_goodnight1.description: Felix was VERY excited about the sleeping quarters. He and Dean got the top bed.
rv_goodnight1.title: Rv Goodnight 1

rv_goodnight2.description: Having curtains just made it all the cozier.
rv_goodnight2.title: Rv Goodnight 2

rv_goodnight3.description: Lucie and Milo got the bottom bed, at the back of the camper.
rv_goodnight3.title: Rv Goodnight 3

rv_goodnight4.description: Morning. Felix and Milo were bouncing with excitment. Dean and Lucie were slow to recover from a night of incessant kicking.
rv_goodnight4.title: Rv Goodnight 4

rv_morning.description: Running water! Gas cooking stove! Electricity!
rv_morning.title: Rv Morning

rv_return.description: Milo and Mimi snooze on the long ride home.
rv_return.title: Rv Return

description:
For about a year now Felix has wanted to take a trip in a camping car. This weekend his dream came true: we rented an RV and drove to Santa Cruz. We went to the beach on Saturday (against Felix's will, he just wanted to stay in the RV all the time), stayed in a real live RV park, and saw the Monterey aquarium on Sunday. It was a lot of fun!

Felix loves science, and everything is science to him. After witnessing a pencil eraser in action for the first time, he couldn't contain his excitement. "How does it work? Where does the pencil mark go? Can I cut open the eraser to see what happens inside? Why does it only work with pencil?". Another example: he likes to compare different yogurts on the solid to liquid scale.
title: September 17
